actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack one Toothy Maw attack and three Tendril attacks. It can replace all three Tendril attacks with use of Reel.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Toothy Maw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 15 ft., one target, The target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Med or smaller creature and the seal can't use the same tendril on another target. If a creature is grappled by two or more tendrils it is also Restrained.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: Pulls each creature grappled by it up to 10 ft. straight toward it.

special_abilities.name: Frozen to the Spot
special_abilities.desc: When on snow or ice the birgemon seal can't be moved vs. its will.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 90 min.
